++ Thia Sianodell

Moon Elf follower of [Sehanine]

ate the Reflection [AkumaFruits]

++++FEYWILD MEMORIES
Thia lived in an era of the [Feywild] that has been long forgotten to any current inhabitant

She had worship in a moon temple of [Sehanine] before [Tajuru] was even established as a small town, at this time the village was known as Elfehone.

She and her sisters one fateful night got an omen in their scrying pool, when it glowed a strong but yet soft blue, Thia went to bathe in the waters, which turned out to no longer be a shallow pool, but that night had turned into a portal that lead to  [Nowa Huta]
